definitions.definition: A cord which loops through the tailpiece and around the endpin of stringed musical instruments, and which is held at tension by a knot to secure the tailpiece to the body, traditionally made only of gut but now also made of nylon , wire and other synthetic materials.
The portion of the gut beyond the anus .

main_definition: ( music , lutherie ) A cord which loops through the tailpiece and around the endpin of stringed musical instruments, and which is held at tension by a knot to secure the tailpiece to the body, traditionally made only of gut but now also made of nylon , wire and other synthetic materials.
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy ) The portion of the gut beyond the anus .
